verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> unto my Lord, <S%H113><s%> Sit <S%H3427><s%> thou at my right hand, <S%H3225><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> I make <S%H7896><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> thy footstool. <S%H1916><s%> <S%H7272><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> of thy strength <S%H5797><s%> out of Zion: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6726><s%> rule <S%H7287><s%> thou in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thine enemies. <S%H341><s%>

Thy people <S%H5971><s%> shall be willing <S%H5071><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of thy power, <S%H2428><s%> in the beauties <S%H1926><s%> of holiness <S%H6944><s%> from the womb <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7358><s%> of the morning: <S%H4891><s%> thou hast the dew <S%H2919><s%> of thy youth. <S%H3208><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath sworn, <S%H7650><s%> and will not <S%H3808><s%> repent, <S%H5162><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> art a priest <S%H3548><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> the order <S%H1700><s%> of Melchizedek. <S%H4442><s%>
The Lord <S%H136><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall strike through <S%H4272><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his wrath. <S%H639><s%>

He shall judge <S%H1777><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> he shall fill <S%H4390><s%> the places with the dead bodies; <S%H1472><s%> he shall wound <S%H4272><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> countries. <S%H776><s%>
He shall drink <S%H8354><s%> of the brook <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5158><s%> in the way: <S%H1870><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall he lift up <S%H7311><s%> the head. <S%H7218><s%>
